Posts.Content: Cicilass wrote: Hello, I sat with my mom on Monday. She had a mastectomy and some nodes removed. my grandmother died of breast cancer-my mom's mom. I have two sisters and a daughter and each of my sisters have a daughter. I am almost paralyzed by the fear I have and I dont know if it's because of my mom or myself or my family. I work at JC Penney's part time and have limited benefits. Maybe it's an excuse or maybe it's fear, but I don't want to go have a mammogram. I want to rage against something, i just dont know what. Can someone help? Cici Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: I'm 40 and scared Cicilass Cicilass

Posts.Content: Aug 6, 2008 07:52PM Cicilass wrote: Thank you for your kind words and insight. I have a mammo scheduled and will have a friend go with me.Â  I fear but I fear NOT! Good luck to you all and wishing you all long lives.
